channel.title: my-blog on wrfly's blog
channel.description: Recent content in my-blog on wrfly's blog

item.title: add disqus to github blog
item.description: Disqus is an online comment script service. Blog or personal website often use it to let people comment their articals. Since I used others freamwork before, the disqus add-one is hers too.So I have to make a personal disqus for myself. It’s very easy.Just sigh in Disqus and click me. Simple easy,hum~
